http.400: Bad Request: The request was invalid or cannot be served.
http.401: Unauthorized: Please log in to access this resource.
http.403: Forbidden: You do not have permission to access this resource.
http.404: Not Found: The requested resource could not be found.
http.405: Method Not Allowed: The HTTP method is not allowed for this endpoint.
http.408: Request Timeout: The request took too long to complete.
http.409: Conflict: The request conflicts with the current state of the server.
http.422: Unprocessable Entity: The request was well-formed but contains semantic errors.
http.429: Too Many Requests: You have sent too many requests recently.
http.500: Internal Server Error: An unexpected error occurred on the server.
http.502: Bad Gateway: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server.
http.503: Service Unavailable: The server is temporarily unavailable.
http.504: Gateway Timeout: The server did not receive a timely response from the upstream server.

network.offline: You are currently offline. Please check your internet connection.
network.connectionLost: Connection to the server was lost. Please try again.
network.timeout: The request timed out. Please try again.
network.dnsError: Could not connect to the server. Please check the URL.
network.sslError: Secure connection failed. Please check your network settings.
network.unknown: A network error occurred. Please try again.

products.invalidData: Invalid product data provided. Please check all required fields.
products.duplicateName: A product with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.
products.deleteFailed: Failed to delete product. The product may be in use.

categories.invalidData: Invalid category data provided. Please check all required fields.
categories.duplicateName: A category with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.
categories.deleteFailed: Failed to delete category. The category may have products assigned.

stockItems.invalidData: Invalid stock item data provided. Please check all required fields.
stockItems.duplicateName: A stock item with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.
stockItems.deleteFailed: Failed to delete stock item. The item may be in use.

layouts.invalidData: Invalid layout data provided. Please check all required fields.
layouts.duplicateName: A layout with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.

auth.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials provided. Please check your username and password.
auth.authenticationFailed: Authentication failed. Please check your username and password.
auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

users.duplicateUsername: A user with this username already exists.
users.cannotDeleteSelf: You cannot delete your own account.
users.cannotDeactivateSelf: You cannot deactivate your own account.

tills.alreadyAssigned: This device is already assigned to another till.
tills.assignmentFailed: Failed to assign device to till.

tabs.alreadyClosed: This tab has already been closed.
tabs.emptyTab: Cannot close an empty tab with items.

orderSessions.alreadyCompleted: This order session has already been completed.
orderSessions.accessDenied: You do not have access to this order session.

boundary.title: Something went wrong
boundary.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

general.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
general.saveFailed: Failed to save changes. Please try again.
general.loadFailed: Failed to load data. Please try again.
general.deleteFailed: Failed to delete item. Please try again.
general.updateFailed: Failed to update item. Please try again.
general.createFailed: Failed to create item. Please try again.
general.forbidden: You do not have permission to perform this action.
general.unauthorized: You must be logged in to perform this action.
general.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
general.validationFailed: Please correct the errors and try again.
general.rateLimited: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
general.maintenance: The system is currently under maintenance. Please try again later.
